column4: question for peoples, If I am using a laptop with two PCMCIA network cards, one wired, one wireless. Is there a better utility/thingy to handle hotswaping the two without rebooting
you should be able to just plug/unplugg without issue. the old will be taken down and new brought up
it doesnt seem to, I unplug the wireless card, wait a minute, and put the wired one in, it still thinks it is wireless
sure it isnt just an issue with network manager?
